pro2E.ui.simulation

Class ArrayPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • pro2E.ui.simulation.ArrayPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ArrayPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
     The ArrayPanel class builds the array panel, which draws the position of the radiators from the antenna array.
    Author:
    pro2E - Team3
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • drawArray

        public void drawArray()
         Calculates the important values after an update and stores them as attributes.
 Whenever the application is resized later on the attributes are still available

      • paintComponent

        protected void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
         Draws the whole antena array.
 Redraws everything after the resizing of the application using the attributes.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
